summary: In this super-feel-good foodie comedy, young Manhattan chef Samir rediscovers his heritage and his passion for life through the enchanting art of cooking Indian food.
cast: Jess Weixler|Kevin Corrigan|Dean Winters|Aarti Mann|Aasif Mandvi|Amir Arison|Naseeruddin Shah|Ajay Naidu|Kevin Breznahan|Angela Lewis|Ranjit Chowdhry|Chloe Brooks|Kumar Pallana|Harish Patel|Erica Peeples|Madhur Jaffrey|Sylvia Kauders|Sean T. title: El plato del día
